channel.title: Heroes of Newerth
channel.description:
I'm surprised there isn't a topic on this. It's a standalone version of dota, in beta atm. I don't have any invites but open beta starts in a couple days.
Does anyone else play/plan to check it out?

item.title: Heroes of Newerth
item.dc:creator: @g-stringer g-stringer
item.description:
@g-stringer wrote:

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:4, topic:334437”]I’ve played a few matches now, it’s pretty fun in small doses. Kinda hard though because of all the pros who played dota, which I never got into.

Gives me something to do while waiting for diablo 3, guild wars 2, deus ex 3, TMI2 etc.

What heros do you play stringer?[/quote]

I can play any hero, but my most played are forsaken archer, deadwood, dark lady, predator and zephyr. Most favourite would be either zephyr or deadwood.

Do you like the new UI ? Kinda hard getting used to.

Read full topic
